title: Dodges and Q leavers while having low priority
body: Its extremely frustrating that you must wait another 20 minutes for a game if a champion select is dodged say 3 times in a row (which just happened to me) and you look away for 1 minute only to see another dodge has been made and you have missed the accept sign because well you weren't  paying attention after choosing your hero 3 times already and been paying attention for three or four previous select times. really fucking annoying specially when your in the Q because the net disconnected you. fuck this game.

replies.body: i understand how you feel man. but the system is the way it is to stop people abusing the queue dodge system so that they have match better suited to them. just take the time out to use practice tool and practice ur last hitting.

>just take the time out to use practice tool and practice ur last hitting.

What has this got to do with anything he just said?
at least he can use the time to be proactive
Dodgers need longer penalties anyway. Imagine getting a one hour queue ban for a first offence, might make these kids who dodge think twice.
